analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#447-452) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#452)

JcnxxxCrowdsale.airdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(MintableToken(token).mint(_to[i],(_value[i].mul((10 ** uint256(18))))) == true) (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#720-725)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#517-526) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#522-523)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#532-536) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#536)

JcnxxxToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#323)
JcnxxxToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#322-323)
JcnxxxToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0x6b0d72192baff8b978820ee72706ae02b4e72468.sol#323)
